languages.text: Как только команда Вольного Торговца заряжает орудия и направляет их на станцию, оборонительные лазеры Адептус Механикус тут же взрезают корпус пустотного корабля, оставляя болезненный шрам, проходящий через несколько палуб. Станционные орудия продолжают палить до тех пор, пока Главный кормчий не отводит корабль на достаточно безопасное расстояние. Ощетинившись, станция более не отвечает на запросы.

traits.locale_text: Как только команда Вольного Торговца заряжает орудия и направляет их на станцию, оборонительные лазеры Адептус Механикус тут же взрезают корпус пустотного корабля, оставляя болезненный шрам, проходящий через несколько палуб. Станционные орудия продолжают палить до тех пор, пока войд-мастер не отводит корабль на достаточно безопасное растояние. Ощетинившись, станция более не отвечает на запросы.

languages.text: As soon as the Rogue Trader's crew load the cannons and aim them at the station, the Adeptus Mechanicus's defence lasers slice the voidship's hull open, leaving a painful-looking scar that spans several decks. The station's guns keep firing until the Master Helmsman moves the ship a safe distance away. Its guns still flaring, the station no longer responds to hails.
languages.original_text: Как только команда Вольного Торговца заряжает орудия и направляет их на станцию, оборонительные лазеры Адептус Механикус тут же взрезают корпус пустотного корабля, оставляя болезненный шрам, проходящий через несколько палуб. Станционные орудия продолжают палить до тех пор, пока Главный кормчий не отводит корабль на достаточно безопасное расстояние. Ощетинившись, станция более не отвечает на запросы.

traits.locale_text: As soon as the Rogue Trader's crew load the cannons and point them at the station, the Adeptus Mechanicus's defence lasers slice the voidship's hull open, leaving a painful-looking scar that runs across several decks. The station's guns keep firing until the head helmsman moves the ship a safe distance away. The station bristles up and no longer answers requests for contant.

As soon as the Rogue Trader's crew load the cannons and point them at the station, the Adeptus Mechanicus's defence lasers slice the voidship's hull open, leaving a painful-looking scar that runs across several decks. The station's guns keep firing until the head helmsman moves the ship a safe distance away. The station bristles up and no longer answers requests for contant.

As soon as the Rogue Trader's crew load the cannons and point them at the station, the Adeptus Mechanicus's defence lasers slice the voidship's hull open, leaving a painful-looking scar that runs across several decks. The station's guns keep firing until the head helmsman moves the ship a safe distance away. Guns still flaring, the station is no longer answering hails.

As soon as the Rogue Trader's crew load the cannons and aim them at the station, the Adeptus Mechanicus's defence lasers slice the voidship's hull open, leaving a painful-looking scar that spans several decks. The station's guns keep firing until the Master Helmsman moves the ship a safe distance away. Its guns still flaring, the station no longer responds to hails.

As soon as the Rogue Trader's crew load the cannons and aim them at the station, the Adeptus Mechanicus's defence lasers slice the voidship's hull open, leaving a painful-looking scar that spans several decks. The station's guns keep firing until the Master Helmsman moves the ship a safe distance away. Its guns still flaring, the station no longer responds to hails.

As soon as the Rogue Trader's crew load the cannons and aim them at the station, the Adeptus Mechanicus's defence lasers slice the voidship's hull open, leaving a painful-looking scar that spans several decks. The station's guns keep firing until the Master Helmsman moves the ship a safe distance away. Its guns still flaring, the station no longer responds to hails.

languages.text: 行商浪人的船员们才刚刚把宏炮装填完成，瞄准机械修会的星站时，星站的防御激光就撕裂了虚空舰的舰体，留下了非常深的烧痕，横跨了几层甲板。星站的大炮不断开火，直到舵手长将虚空舰开到安全距离之外为止。即便如此，星站的大炮依然在开火，也不再对任何信息做出反应。
languages.original_text: As soon as the Rogue Trader's crew load the cannons and aim them at the station, the Adeptus Mechanicus's defence lasers slice the voidship's hull open, leaving a painful-looking scar that spans several decks. The station's guns keep firing until the Master Helmsman moves the ship a safe distance away. Its guns still flaring, the station no longer responds to hails.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人的船员们才刚刚把巨炮架好，瞄准机械修会的星站时，星站的防御激光就撕裂了虚空舰的舰体，留下了非常深的烧痕，横跨了几层甲板。星站的大炮不断开火，直到舵手长将虚空舰开到安全距离之外为止。即便如此，星站的大炮依然在开火，也不再对任何信息做出反应。

languages.text: En cuanto la tripulación de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente carga los cañones y los apunta a la estación, los láseres de defensa del Adeptus Mechanicus cortan el casco de la nave, dejando una dolorosa cicatriz en múltiples cubiertas. Las armas de la estación no dejan de disparar hasta que el maestro timonel aleja la nave a una distancia segura. Con las armas aún activas, la estación deja de responder a las comunicaciones.
languages.original_text: As soon as the Rogue Trader's crew load the cannons and aim them at the station, the Adeptus Mechanicus's defence lasers slice the voidship's hull open, leaving a painful-looking scar that spans several decks. The station's guns keep firing until the Master Helmsman moves the ship a safe distance away. Its guns still flaring, the station no longer responds to hails.

traits.locale_text: En cuanto la tripulación de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente carga los cañones y los apunta a la estación, los láseres de defensa del Adeptus Mechanicus cortan el casco de la nave, dejando una dolorosa cicatriz en múltiples cubiertas. Las armas de la estación no dejan de disparar hasta que el maestro timonel aleja la nave a una distancia segura. Con las armas aún activas, la estación deja de responder a las comunicaciones.

languages.text: ローグトレーダーのクルーがキャノン砲を装填してステーションに照準を合わせた瞬間、帝国技術局の防衛レーザーがヴォイドシップの船体を切り裂き、数デッキに及ぶ痛々しい傷跡を残す。マスター・ヘルムスマンが船を安全な距離に移動させるまで、ステーションでは砲撃を続けた。砲撃はまだされているが、ステーションはもはや応答しない。
languages.original_text: As soon as the Rogue Trader's crew load the cannons and aim them at the station, the Adeptus Mechanicus's defence lasers slice the voidship's hull open, leaving a painful-looking scar that spans several decks. The station's guns keep firing until the Master Helmsman moves the ship a safe distance away. Its guns still flaring, the station no longer responds to hails.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーのクルーがキャノン砲を装填してステーションに照準を合わせた瞬間、帝国技術局（アデプトゥス・メカニカス）の防衛レーザーがヴォイドシップの船体を切り裂き、数デッキに及ぶ痛々しい傷跡を残す。マスター・ヘルムスマンが船を安全な距離に移動させるまで、ステーションでは砲撃を続けた。砲撃はまだされているが、ステーションはもはや応答しない。

languages.text: Sobald die Crew {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} die Kanonen lädt und auf die Station zielt, schneiden die Verteidigungslaser des Adeptus Mechanicus die Hülle des Raumschiffs auf und hinterlassen eine schmerzhaft aussehende Narbe, die sich über mehrere Decks erstreckt. Die Waffen der Station feuern weiter, bis der Hauptsteuermann das Schiff in sichere Entfernung bringt. Die Station, die noch immer ununterbrochen ihre Waffen abfeuert, reagiert nicht mehr auf Kontaktversuche.
languages.original_text: As soon as the Rogue Trader's crew load the cannons and aim them at the station, the Adeptus Mechanicus's defence lasers slice the voidship's hull open, leaving a painful-looking scar that spans several decks. The station's guns keep firing until the Master Helmsman moves the ship a safe distance away. Its guns still flaring, the station no longer responds to hails.

traits.locale_text: Sobald die Crew {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} die Kanonen lädt und auf die Station zielt, schneiden die Verteidigungslaser des Adeptus Mechanicus die Hülle des Raumschiffs auf und hinterlassen eine schmerzhaft aussehende Narbe, die sich über mehrere Decks erstreckt. Die Waffen der Station feuern weiter, bis der Hauptsteuermann das Schiff in sichere Entfernung bringt. Die Station, die noch immer ununterbrochen ihre Waffen abfeuert, reagiert nicht mehr auf Kontaktversuche.

languages.text: Dès que l'équipage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} charge ses canons et les pointe sur la station, les lasers de défense de l'Adeptus Mechanicus découpent la coque du croiseur stellaire, laissant une terrible cicatrice là où se trouvaient plusieurs ponts. Les canons de la station continuent de tirer jusqu'à ce que le maître timonier déplace le vaisseau à bonne distance. Ses canons toujours actifs, la station ne répond plus à vos appels.
languages.original_text: As soon as the Rogue Trader's crew load the cannons and aim them at the station, the Adeptus Mechanicus's defence lasers slice the voidship's hull open, leaving a painful-looking scar that spans several decks. The station's guns keep firing until the Master Helmsman moves the ship a safe distance away. Its guns still flaring, the station no longer responds to hails.

traits.locale_text: Dès que l'équipage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} charge ses canons et les pointe sur la station, les lasers de défense de l'Adeptus Mechanicus découpent la coque du croiseur stellaire, laissant une terrible cicatrice là où se trouvaient plusieurs ponts. Les canons de la station continuent de tirer jusqu'à ce que le maître timonier déplace le vaisseau à bonne distance. Ses canons toujours actifs, la station ne répond plus à vos appels.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in mürettebatı topları doldurup istasyonu hedef alır almaz Adeptus Mechanicus'un savunma lazerleri, uçsuz gemisinin gövdesini yararak birkaç güverteyi kaplayan, acı verici bir yara bırakıyor. Başserdümen, gemiyi güvenli bir mesafeye çekene kadar istasyonun silahları ateş etmeye devam ediyor. Silahları hâlâ ateşlenirken istasyon, hiçbir çağrıya yanıt vermiyor.
languages.original_text: As soon as the Rogue Trader's crew load the cannons and aim them at the station, the Adeptus Mechanicus's defence lasers slice the voidship's hull open, leaving a painful-looking scar that spans several decks. The station's guns keep firing until the Master Helmsman moves the ship a safe distance away. Its guns still flaring, the station no longer responds to hails.
